name: Brushworks Lift & Shape Tape (3 Pairs)
attributes: Wear your clothes with confidence when using the Brushworks Lift and Shape Tape. Ideal for any strapless, backless, or low-cut items of clothing. name: Invogue French Dream Square Nails - Pack of 24
attributes: Achieve salon looking nails with Invogue Square Nails in ‘French Dream’. This pack of high-quality, medium length nails in graduating sizes are not only easy to apply, but also feature a seamless cuticle line for a natural finish. Inspired by a summer of love in the city of Paris, these elegant false nails are ideal for a subtle, classy aesthetic with a hint of fun. Contains 2ml glue. How to use: Remove all nail polish prior to application. Prep nails by applying nail dehydrator or alternatively you can use acetone on a cotton pad. Lay out false nails in the order that you will be applying them. Swirl a small amount of glue onto your real nail and the false nail. Carefully place the false nail directly over your real nail so that the bottom curve lines up with your cuticle. Press down gently and hold until set. Repeat with the remaining nails. File nails into your desired shape.
desc: Is your nailcare in need of an upgrade? We’ve got everything you need for an at home nail salon. Get ready for a night out with stick on false nail sets, from dreamy nudes to French manicures, or give your natural nails some love with our sets of gel nail varnishes and top coats. name: Maybelline Tattoo Brow 36hr Brow Gel
attributes: Wake up to evenly-filled brows with Maybelline's new Tattoo Brow Peel Off Eyebrow Gel Tint. Gone are the days of over plucking and tracing on pencil thin lines - beautifully thick eyebrows are back and everybody wants in on this beauty trend! An easy answer to eyebrow tinting, our semi permanent brow gel will leave your eyebrows looking naturally full for up to 3 days, and all from the comfort of your own home. Easy to use in just 3 steps, simply apply the gel to the desired shape, leave to set and peel off with your fingers - no need to visit a salon! Step 1: Clean your brows and apply our Tattoo Brow tinted semi-permanent eyebrows over your existing brow hair. If any mistakes are made or you need to reshape, use a cotton bud to easily remove your Tattoo Brow before it sets. Step 2:Leave your new brows to set for at least 20 minutes. For super long wear, set the product for up to 2 hours. Step 3:Using your fingers to peel off the Brow Tattoo semi-permanent eyebrows by starting at the inner corner of each brow. Step 4: The tint will be revealed underneath, giving you naturally fuller looking brows. Please note: To make the most of your long-wear tint, try to avoid exfoliating or harsh cleansers. INGREDIENTS: ISODODECANE • ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE • TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE • DIMETHICONE • DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE • PROPYLENE CARBONATE • PENTYLENE GLYCOL • C8-9 ISOALKANE • SILICA SILYLATE • CAPRYLYL GLYCOL • ISOPROPYL TITANIUM TRIISOSTEARATE • ALUMINA ● [+/- MAY CONTAIN: CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / IRON OXIDES • CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE • MICA • CI 77742 / MANGANESE VIOLET • CI 77510 / FERRIC FERROCYANIDE]. (F.I.L. Z293767/3).
desc: These days, it’s all about the brows - and that’s why this eyebrow makeup is going to be an absolute staple in your makeup bag. Refine and shape your brows with ease, creating the illusion of a fuller brow or fleshing out your natural brows in just the right kind of way. With an eyebrow pencil or gel, you can easily add colour and density with hair-like strokes. When it comes to essential makeup, this one is firmly on the must-have list.
